channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Embankment Lights, 8th November
item.description:
6 lampposts and connecting lights are not on. This is on the Victoria Embankment where the Tattershall Castle is located. Other lights along the Embankment are working ok

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Embankment, Waterloo, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: All out - three or more street lights in a row

item.title: Yet more flytipping, 8th November
item.description:
The picture says it all. When can we expect a long term solution to this weekly problem? Is it too much to ask to not live in a dumping ground? Please Lambeth, this needs to be taken seriously. It is unhygienic, attracting vermin and unsightly. These open bin areas are now also attracting undesirable drug using gatherings.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heath Road, Clapham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old wet Leaves not swept 3+weeks Foulden Road, 8th November
item.description:
Piles of leaves creating a hazard on one side of foulden road, rotting into gulley and drains and dangerously covering uneven pavement not swept for more than 3 weeks Hackney says action taken, thatâ€™s untrue!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Foulden Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath needs leaf clearance, 8th November
item.description:
Footpath of Plaistow Lane near the school, and the junction with feeelands Road requires leaves clearing - once it rains these will get very slippery and this is a high footfall area by the school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plaistow Lane, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet
